Reach Impressions By Type

Organic Impressions
{{reach.organicdata}}

{{reach.paiddata}}

Number of impressions of a Sponsored Story or Ad pointing to your Page

Viral Impressions
{{reach.viraldata}}

Number of people who saw your Page or any of its posts from a story shared by a friend
